Title: Find things to do in Singapore this weekend
Description: We’re sure you have more than enough activities to fill your upcoming weekend. If not, check out our ultimate list of things to do in Singapore or the best attractions and activities in Singapore . If you’re looking for pretty places to snap lots of photos, hit up these Instagrammable places in Singapore while you’re at it. And those looking to plan their calendars in advance can check out our full list of upcoming live performances in 2025 .  Cover image adapted from: @ladygaga & @mcdsg via Instagram, Sofitel A portion of this content may contain partial partnership or referral links to products. However, all opinions are ours.
